ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Taking my antipsychotic medication makes me feel better
Notes: 1 = completely disagree; 2 = generaly disagree; 3 = Undecided; 4 = generally agree to 5 = completely agree

ElementDescription: Taking my antipsychotic medication helps prevent getting hospitalized
Notes: 1 = completely disagree; 2 = generaly disagree; 3 = Undecided; 4 = generally agree to 5 = completely agree

ElementDescription: Side effects from my antipsychotic medication bother me
Notes: 1 = completely disagree; 2 = generaly disagree; 3 = Undecided; 4 = generally agree to 5 = completely agree

ElementDescription: I have a system to remember (e.g., pill box, medication calendar, someone giving me my medication) that helps me remember to take my antipsychotic medication
Notes: 1 = completely disagree; 2 = generaly disagree; 3 = Undecided; 4 = generally agree to 5 = completely agree

ElementDescription: Taking my antipsychotic medication is difficult to remember everyday
Notes: 1 = completely disagree; 2 = generaly disagree; 3 = Undecided; 4 = generally agree to 5 = completely agree

ElementDescription: Getting my antipsychotic medication from the hospital or pharmacy is not a problem
Notes: 1 = completely disagree; 2 = generaly disagree; 3 = Undecided; 4 = generally agree to 5 = completely agree

ElementDescription: I am supported by my family, friends and doctors to take my antipsychotic medication
Notes: 1 = completely disagree; 2 = generaly disagree; 3 = Undecided; 4 = generally agree to 5 = completely agree

ElementDescription: I have a psychiatric disorder that antipsychotic medication improves
Notes: 1 = completely disagree; 2 = generaly disagree; 3 = Undecided; 4 = generally agree to 5 = completely agree
Global Score: sum of individual items; 2 items reverse-scored
